law.catch_line: The sales and use tax is computed on:...
law.text:
The sales and use tax is computed on:
the taxable price of each separate sale;
if a combined sale is made, the combined taxable price of all retail sales on the same occasion by the same vendor to the same buyer; or
if retail sales of tangible personal property or a taxable service are made through vending or other self-service machines, 94.5% of the gross receipts from the retail sales.
